org.lightsleep.database

Class Oracle

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lightsleep.database.Standard
      • org.lightsleep.database.Oracle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Database

    public class Oracle
extends Standard
    A database handler for Oracle Database.
    The object of this class has a TypeConverter map with the following additional TypeConverter to Standard.typeConverterMap.
    Registered TypeConverter objects
    Source data typeDestination data typeConversion Contents
    BooleanSqlStringfalse -> 0
    true -> 1
    String '...'
    Converts control character to '...'||CHR(n)||'...'.
    ? (SQL parameter) if long
    Time TO_TIMESTAMP('1970-01-01 HH:mm:ss','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS.FF3')
    byte[]? (SQL parameter)
    oracle.sql.TIMESTAMPjava.util.DateThrows a ConvertException if SQLException is thrown when getting value.
    java.sql.Date
    java.sql.Time
    java.sql.Timestamp
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Masato Kokubo
    See Also:
    TypeConverter, Standard
